title: Natural ranchitas with chicken
ingredients: 1 Libra of cooked and crumbled chicken breast
1/2 Mozzarella or Cheddar cheese cup to melt
Yummies natural ranchitas the necessary amount
instructions: Step 1. In a pan put the mazola oil and saute the chicken.
Step 2. As we cook the chicken we season it with the garlic and coriander marinade.
Step 3. We add the chopped garlic, the sauce that ketchup and the water.
Step 4. We cook gently until the chicken is half -called.
Step 5. On a plate we place the natural ranchitas of Yummies, then a portion of chicken on top.
Step 6. Sprinkle the cheese on top and take a microwave so that the cheese is melt.
Step 8. We serve with the Creole sofrito on top of the Nachos.
